description: The dotMailer SDK allows a .NET application or library to programmatically interact with a dotMailer account, to enable the sending of email marketing campaigns to any number of email addresses.  Many facets of the dotMailer platform can be accessed using the SDK including accessing details of which recipients opened the email and whether links within it were clicked.
releaseNotes:
Changes in the dotMailer SDK from version 1.7.4 to 1.7.5
--------------------------------------------------------------

* Locale of Account is now availible from the account Info
* Improved date time handling 
* Added RemoveAddressBookContacts to addressbook factory
* Added UserTag1 and UserTag2 to IDmObject
summary: A library to enable software developed using the .NET Framework to integrate with dotMailer's email services.
title: dotMailer Software Development Kit
